questions.question: What does digital citizenship mean?
options: Following only your school Wi-Fi rules
Using the internet responsibly and respectfully
Posting as much personal info as possible
questions.correct_answer: Using the internet responsibly and respectfully

questions.question: What is Myra's main role in MASK?
options: To trick players into sharing passwords
To guide students in staying safe online
To teach only math and science
questions.correct_answer: To guide students in staying safe online
